data.title: Design Studios in the Netherlands
data.meta_description: Browse Dexigner's curated selection of 150+ design studios based in the Netherlands.
data.text:
UXUS

UXUS is a cutting edge multidisciplinary full-service international creative agency based in Amsterdam. We collaborate with the world's biggest brands across diverse industries to reimagine their vision into emotive experiences that redefine categories.

uxus.com

Amsterdam

Category Multidisciplinary Design Studios

Pitch Black

Pitch Black is a graphic design studio based in Berlin and The Hague, and a workspace in Brussels, specialized in corporate design. Our clients include social, scientific, political and cultural institutions, associations and NGOs acting internationally in the field of development aid, philanthropy and science as well as in societal issues.

pitchblackgraphicdesign.com

Duinoord, Den Haag

Category Graphic Design Studios

Dutch Design Agency

As an independent creative solutions agency, it is our vision to enhance the world we all live, work and play in. We fuel unconventional visions with high-end design, and strategic power to convert them into usable solutions of the future. Connecting people, strategy, technology and space, we empower growth and make great ideas the new norm.

dd.agency

Amsterdam

Category Branding Design Studios

Kossmanndejong

Kossmanndejong is a design studio in Amsterdam for exhibition architecture. The firm was set up in 1998 by Herman Kossmann (1958) and Mark de Jong (1960), both of whom graduated in architecture from Delft University.

kossmanndejong.nl

Amsterdam

Category Exhibition Design Studios

VBAT

VBAT (1984) is an internationally oriented brand development agency specialized in brand consultancy, concept and design. VBAT provides a broad spectrum of disciplines, including corporate, retail, interactive and packaging design. Deploying creativity as a business driver, VBAT creates the visual brand expression of a company, service, product or environment, giving brands a tangible presence for their target audience. With over 80 passionate professionals we deliver creative solutions for both national and international brands.

vbat.com

Amsterdam

Category Multidisciplinary Design Studios

Spark

Spark is a design agency, based in Rotterdam, The Netherlands and with a branch office in Recife, Brazil. We are a team of 30 professionals with a passion for innovation and design.

sparkdesign.nl

Delfshaven, Rotterdam

Category Industrial Design Studios

studioMOM

StudioMOM is a Dutch based design agency that was set up in 2002 by Alfred van Elk and Mars Holwerda. StudioMOM is specialized in product identity and product design.

studiomom.nl

Spijkerkwartier, Arnhem

Category Industrial Design Studios

Scholten & Baijings

Scholten & Baijings is a Dutch Design duo, run by Stefan Scholten and Carole Baijngs established in 2000. In their designs they make use of grids, colour, transparencies and layers.

scholtenbaijings.com

Centrum, Amsterdam

Category Industrial Design Studios

Lava

Lava is a design agency founded in 1990. The current team exists of 10 talented designers and three projectmanagers. The agency is focused on creative strategy, editorial design and dynamic identities.

lava.nl

Amsterdam

Category Multidisciplinary Design Studios

Mainstudio

Mainstudio is an Amsterdam based graphic design studio, founded by Edwin van Gelder in 2005. The studio creates projects deriving from the intersection of art and architecture including publications, digital media, and visual identities.

mainstudio.com

Amsterdam

Category Graphic Design Studios

Part of a Bigger Plan

Part of a Bigger Plan is an Amsterdam-based creative studio that creates and produces award-winning communications for international clients. We take pride in crafting concepts and branding that incorporate the disciplines of graphic design, illustration, art and film direction.

partofabiggerplan.com

Centrum, Amsterdam

Category Advertising Design Studios

Barcode Architects

Barcode Architects (Bureau for Architecture and Contemporary Design) is a Rotterdam-based architecture and urban design office founded in 2009 by Dirk Peters and Caro van de Venne. The office comprises an international team of 60 creative professionals, including architects, urban designers, and technologists. Our projects are driven by the ambition to realize high-quality buildings that revitalize and transform their context, offer a moving experience that awakens an aesthetic awareness, and that users can identify with.

barcodearchitects.com

Centrum, Rotterdam

Category Architectural Design Studios

Shop Around

Shop Around is a creative production agency that specializes in illustration, animation, motion graphic and graphic design solutions. During the 20+ years of our existence, we've thoughtfully curated solutions and offered seasoned guidance to our clients, including advertising agencies, TV networks, publishers and record companies.

shop-around.nl

Amsterdam

Category Multidisciplinary Design Studios

Today

We're a design agency that works to deliver smart communication solutions that contribute to a positive change. We are accessible and professional from strategy to creation. We're able to deal with anything you throw at us, however complex. Our focus is on developing and nurturing a strong brand identity.

today.nl

Zuid-West, Utrecht

Category Graphic Design Studios

Mokkō

Mokkō​ is an Amsterdam based interior design studio founded by Aad Bos. For businesses and private clients, we design and create complete interiors as well as single interior products, including acoustic art panels and furniture.

mokkoamsterdam.com

Westpoort, Amsterdam

Category Interior Design Studios

Piet Boon

Award-winning design practice Piet Boon creates bespoke contemporary architecture, interiors and products for the global luxury market. Renowned worldwide for exceptional craftsmanship, quality and vision, the premium lifestyle brand is distinguished by its design philosophy of refined sophistication. The practice was established in 1983 by Dutch designer Piet Boon.

pietboon.nl

Oostzaan

Category Interior Design Studios

Stereo Design

Stereo Design is a full service industrial design agency. We have extensive experience in strategic consultancy, concept development, design engineering and prototyping. Our clients include Friesland Campina, Joolz and Waka Waka.

stereodesign.nl

Amsterdam

Category Industrial Design Studios

FLEX/design

FLEX/design is an industrial design, product development and structural packaging agency that strives to create a new reality: for our clients, for consumers and for our society. We do this by developing new consumer products, structural packaging solutions and professional products.

flex.nl

Delft

Category Industrial Design Studios

DigitasLBi

DigitasLBi is a marketing and technology agency blending insight and creativity to solve business problems. We work with many of the world's best brands to help them define and execute their digital strategies.

digitaslbi.com

Amsterdam

Category Advertising Agencies
